title: Kim Kardashian shares picture of Kanye West and North snoozing
text:
Kim Kardashian shared a sweet photo of her husband Kanye West snoozing with their daughter North on her Instagram on Friday.

The 42-year-old star and his 6-year-old protege looked sound asleep as they snuggled together in bed along with a cuddly toy.

The mother-of-four, 38, captioned the picture with a Zzz emoji. She later shared a cute video of Chicago dress up in pink.

The rapper, who describes himself to friends as a 'born again Christian', is clearly enjoying being with the kids again after being notably absent from the family's recent trip to Armenia.

Family time: Kim Kardashian shared a photo of Kanye West and daughter North snoozing in bed on Friday

Proud mom: Kim also shared video of her cute daughter Chicago on Friday

Big smile: Chicago managed a grin behind her Wubbanub pacifier

Later on Friday, Kim again took to Instagram to share a behind-the-scenes shot as she did an interview.

In the post, a sleek looking Kim can be seen sitting in front of a light that is being set up by a crew member.

'BTS Keeping Up With The Kardashians Interviews (PS love the cream eyeliner @kkwbeauty matte’a 90’s collection!),' she captioned the photo.

There she is: Later on Friday, Kim again took to Instagram to share a behind-the-scenes shot as she did an interview

In a surprising move for the star's very religious husband, Ye didn't attend his own children's baptism.

Kim had the couple's three youngest children, Saint, three, Chicago, 17 months, and Psalm, four months, welcomed into the Christian faith during her trip. Kim herself also joined her 'babies' in the ceremony.

It is unclear whether North was included in the baptism as she previously underwent the ritual in Jerusalem in 2015.

Kim shared photos, which included North, from the church ceremony, on her Instagram account and wrote: 'Thank you Armenia for such a memorable trip. So blessed to have been baptized along with my babies at Mother See of Holy Etchmiadzin, Armenia's main cathedral which is sometimes referred to as the Vatican of the Armenian Apostolic Church. This church was built in 303 AD (sic)'

Both Kim and North wore headscarves in the pictures, while the 38-year-old star's sister Kourtney Kardashian, along with her three children Mason, nine, Penelope, seven, and four-year-old Reign, could be seen in one of them.

Where's Kanye? The 'born again Christian' rapper was noticeably absent from his children's baptism in Armenia earlier this month

Sacred trip: Kim traveled to the country with the couple's four children North, six, Saint, three, Chicago, 17 months, and Psalm, four months. She is pictured here with Chicago

No explanation has been given for Kanye's absence. (A spokesperson for Kim did not respond to DailyMail.com's request for comment at the time.)

Kanye's focus on religion has intensified in recent years and he now holds a regular church style 'Sunday Service.'

His next album is titled Jesus Is King (the release date is still unclear after numerous delays) and he is releasing an IMax film by the same name.

It seems his faith has also change his view on his wife's revealing clothing, which has caused tension in their marriage.

The rapper didn't approve of the low-cut Thierry Mugler dress she wore to the Met Gala earlier this year, and he wanted her to wear something more conservative.

In scenes shown on Keeping Up With The Kardashians, the 42-year-old rapper said: 'The corset, underwear, all of that vibe, I just feel like I just went through this transition where, from being a rapper, like, looking at all these girls, and looking at my wife, like, oh, my girl needs to be just like the other girls, showing her body off, showing this, showing that.

Tension: The couple argued over Kanye's new conservative views about his wife's image in a recent scene from Keeping Up With The Kardashians

'Too sexy': Kanye didn't approve of the low-cut Thierry Mugler dress she was planning to wear to the Met Gala

'And I didn't realise that that was affecting, like, my soul and my spirit as someone that's married and loved, and the father of, like, now what about to be four kids.

'A corset is like a form of underwear. It's hot. It's like, it's hot for who, though?'

However, the reality star fired back and told her man she didn't need the 'negative energy' of his disapproval.

She argued: 'You knew last night I was having really bad anxiety, and I don't need any more negative energy for you to now say that you're not into me wearing a tight dress.'

Kanye then insisted it 'affects' him when his partner poses for 'sexy' photos.

He added: 'You are my wife and it affects me when pictures are too sexy.'

However, Kim pointed out her husband was the reason she felt confident and sexy, while insisting they were now in different places when it comes to their attitudes.

She explained: 'You built me up to be, like, this sexy person and confident and all this stuff. And just because you're on a journey, and you're on your transformation doesn't mean that I'm in the same spot with you.'
description: The rapper, who describes himself as a 'born again Christian', is clearly enjoying being with the kids again after being notably absent from the family's recent trip to Armenia.
